HomeRemedies: Mint Leaves Paste — Ingredients: Crushed mint leaves. Instructions: Apply to skin, leave 10 min, rinse.
Green Tea Compress — Ingredients: 1 green tea bag. Instructions: Brew and cool, place on skin/eyes for 10 min, remove.
Lemon Honey Mix — Ingredients: 1 tsp lemon + 1 tsp honey. Instructions: Apply 5 min, rinse.
Oatmeal Mask — Ingredients: 2 tbsp ground oats + water. Instructions: Make paste, apply for 15 min, rinse.
Cucumber Slices — Instructions: Place slices on skin for 10 min, rinse.

Products.usage_note:

• Boosts collagen production for firmer skin structure.

HomeRemedies: Cucumber Slices — Instructions: Place slices on skin for 10 min, rinse.
Turmeric Paste — Ingredients: 1 tsp turmeric + 1 tsp honey + milk drops. Instructions: Apply 10 min, rinse.
Mint Leaves Paste — Ingredients: Crushed mint leaves. Instructions: Apply to skin, leave 10 min, rinse.
Aloe Vera Gel — Instructions: Apply gel, leave 15 min, rinse with water.
Honey Mask — Ingredients: 1 tbsp honey. Instructions: Apply on affected area, leave 10–15 min, rinse.

MorningRoutine: Step 1: Cleanser (removes oil and dust) → Step 2: Light moisturizer (keeps skin hydrated without extra oil) → Step 3: Sunscreen (protects from UV rays)
NightRoutine: Step 1: Gentle face wash (removes dirt and makeup) → Step 2: Serum/gel (targets skin concern) → Step 3: Moisturizer (locks hydration)

NightRoutine: Step 1: Gentle face wash (removes dirt and makeup) → Step 2: Serum/gel (targets skin concern) → Step 3: Moisturizer (locks hydration)
